events.speaker: Alto
events.text: Just a little more... come on, you stubborn piece of junk!

events.speaker: Mina
events.text: Alto, be careful. The pressure gauge is in the red zone.

events.speaker: Alto
events.text: Don't worry, Mina. I can hear it. The engine wants to run. It's singing!

events.description: The engine roars to life, emitting black smoke.

events.speaker: Imperial Trooper
events.text: Found them! The fugitive girl is here! Seize her!
